util.linalg

Class HessenbergDecomposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.linalg.HessenbergDecomposition

  • public class HessenbergDecomposition
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the hessenberg decomposition which decomposes a square matrix A into U * H * Ut where H is a upper hessenberg matrix and U is a orthonormal matrix. Upper hessenberg matrices are upper triangular matrices with nonzero values in the band directly below the diagonal. The implementation uses householder matrices to zero elements.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
